cooldown.description: Interval of ticks this power needs to recharge before the power can be triggered again.
cooldown.markdownDescription: Interval of ticks this power needs to recharge before the power can be triggered again.

speed.description: The speed applied to the player in the upwards direction.
speed.markdownDescription: The speed applied to the player in the upwards direction.

hud_render.description: Determines how the cooldown of this power is visualized on the HUD.
hud_render.markdownDescription: Determines how the cooldown of this power is visualized on the HUD.

sound.description: If specified, the sound event with this namespace and ID will be played when the power is triggered.
sound.markdownDescription: If specified, the sound event with this namespace and ID will be played when the power is triggered.

key.description: Which active key this power should respond to.
key.markdownDescription: Which active key this power should respond to.
